guide.title: User's guide
guide.gettingStartedDesc1: Welcome to your communication app! This app helps you express yourself through phrases, images, and interactive features.
guide.gettingStartedDesc2: Navigate through different screens using the bottom tabs: Home, Phrases, Challenge, Shop, Settings, and History.
guide.homeScreenDesc1: Your personalized dashboard displaying your avatar, bookmarked phrases, and quick access buttons.
guide.homeScreenDesc2: Tap bookmarked phrases to use them instantly, or long-press to manage bookmarks. Access recent history, daily challenges, and QR code scanning from here.
guide.phrasesOverviewDesc1: Phrases are the main part of your app. There are 3 types: Categories (like folders to organize things), Tasks (single screens with buttons you can tap), and Processes (a series of Tasks to help you say what you want).
guide.phrasesOverviewDesc2: You can add pictures to everything and save your favorites. Only Tasks can speak out loud. You can add, change, or remove anything to make the app work better for you.
guide.categoriesStructureDesc1: Categories kind of work like folders. The app puts phrases in main Categories like Food & Drinks, Directions, Emergency, and Others. Inside these folders, you can have smaller folders like 'Hawker Centre' inside Food & Drinks.
guide.categoriesStructureDesc2: Each Category can either start a process or have smaller folders inside it. Tap Categories to see what's inside, or go to the Task that the Category links to.
guide.processesAndTasksDesc1: Processes are actions that help you say what you want. Each process has one or more Tasks that give you choices to pick from.
guide.processesAndTasksDesc2: Tasks are screens with buttons you can tap. When you tap a choice, the speech text and choice(s) will speak out loud.
guide.taskNavigationDesc1: When you are inside a process, the screen turns light blue. This takes you through different Tasks to help you say exactly what you want.
guide.taskNavigationDesc2: Each Task may show you different choices based on what you picked before. Some Tasks let you pick multiple things (with square checkboxes), others let you pick just one thing (with round circles).
guide.taskNavigationDesc3: The app remembers what you picked and builds your message. You can go back to change your answers, or finish when you reach the last Task.
guide.taskExamplesDesc1: Common Tasks include ordering food (pick your dish, how spicy, eat here or takeaway, how to pay) or asking for directions (where you want to go, bus or MRT, any special needs).
guide.taskExamplesDesc2: The Tasks change based on what you pick. For example, if you pick 'Chicken Rice' for Ordering at hawker centres, it will show a different Task (add-ons) for the next step compared to if you pick 'Laksa'.
guide.addingPhrasesDesc1: Tap the '+' button to add your own phrases. You can add new Categories, new choices, and even new Tasks with their own settings.
guide.addingPhrasesDesc2: When adding something new, pick 'Category' to make a Category or 'Task' to make a new Task. You can also add pictures to make things easier to understand.
guide.addingCategoriesDesc1: Pick 'Category' when adding something new to make a Category. Categories help keep similar things together so they're easier to find.
guide.addingCategoriesDesc2: Give your Category a clear name and add a picture if you want. New Categories show up where you are now and can hold smaller Categories inside.
guide.addingTasksDesc1: Pick 'Task' when adding in the Categories area to make a new Task.
guide.addingTasksDesc2: First, put a name for the Category in the 'Task Text' field, then choose either an existing task to lead to or 'New Task' to create a new one.
guide.addingTasksDesc3: Next, put a title for the new Task, and type in speech text to show in the speech bubble. Lastly, set the Task settings for how you want it to work and tap 'Add' to finish.
guide.addingTasksSubHeader4: Allow multiple choices in the next Task:
guide.addingTasksDesc4: Each Task can let you pick one thing or many things.
guide.addingTasksSubHeader5: Different selected choices lead to different next Tasks:
guide.addingTasksDesc5: Depending on what you pick, it might take you to different next Tasks. This cannot be chosen if 'Allow multiple choices' is on.
guide.editingPhrasesDesc1: Press and hold any Category, Task, or choice to bring up the options menu, and click on 'Edit' to show the edit screen.
guide.editingPhrasesDesc2: For Categories and choices, you can change its title and picture.
guide.editingPhrasesDesc3: For Tasks, you can also change the speech text, which next Task it goes to, and the Task settings.
guide.editingPhrasesDesc4: To delete something, pick the delete option from the edit screen.
guide.bookmarkSystemDesc1: Press and hold any category or choice to save it as a favorite. Your favorites will show up on your Home screen for quick access.
guide.bookmarkSystemDesc2: Saved favorites show up in yellow color throughout the app. On your Home screen, the ones you use most often appear first to make them easier to find.
guide.bookmarkManagementDesc1: To remove a favorite, press and hold it and pick 'Remove Bookmark'. You can also remove favorites from the Home screen by pressing and holding them.
guide.bookmarkManagementDesc2: When you save Tasks as favorites, they remember your previous choices when possible, making it faster to do things you do often like ordering food.
guide.dailyChallengeDesc1: Do daily tasks to earn coins! Every day there's a new challenge that asks you to find certain phrases or use certain choices in Tasks.
guide.dailyChallengeDesc2: Submit your answer when you finish the challenge. If you get it right, you earn coins to buy things in the shop.
guide.shopAvatarDesc1: Use the coins you earn to buy new clothes and items for your avatar like hats, shirts, pants, and shoes.
guide.shopAvatarDesc2: Pick different Categories in the shop to see what's available. Tap locked items to buy them with coins, or tap unlocked items to wear them.
guide.historyTrackingDesc1: Look at your history to see what phrases and choices you used before.
guide.historyTrackingDesc2: Tap history items to hear them speak again. Press and hold to save them as favorites or delete ones you don't want.
guide.languageSettingsDesc1: Change between English, Chinese, Malay, and Tamil languages by tapping the language buttons in Settings.
guide.languageSettingsDesc2: Pick how you want buttons to look and choose different voices for when the app speaks out loud.
guide.emergencyFeaturesDesc1: Add a caregiver's phone number in Settings so you can quickly call for help using the Emergency phrases.
guide.emergencyFeaturesDesc2: The Emergency button lets you instantly call your caregiver when you need help right away.
guide.qrCodeScanningDesc1: Use the QR code scanner from the Home screen to get rewards or special content from other people.
guide.qrCodeScanningDesc2: Point your camera at QR codes to automatically do things like getting coins from caregivers or friends.
guide.searchFunctionDesc1: Use the search box in Phrases to find anything in the app. It can find buttons, folder names, and even choices inside Tasks.
guide.searchFunctionDesc2: Search results show you exactly where things are located (like 'Food & Drinks > Hawker Centre > Chicken Rice') so you know where to find them.
guide.searchTipsDesc1: Search doesn't care about big or small letters and can find parts of words. Try searching for words like 'spicy', 'payment', or place names to find related things.
guide.searchTipsDesc2: When search finds Tasks, you can tap them to start using them right away, or go to their folder to see everything else there.
guide.accessibilityFeaturesDesc1: All buttons can speak out loud with natural voices in different languages to help you communicate clearly.
guide.accessibilityFeaturesDesc2: Big buttons, clear pictures, and simple navigation make the app easy to use for everyone.
